text: 1.24 1 Sml 16.7, Jer 11.20, Jon 2.25, Lep 2.23 Bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak, anɨgɨl aglɨl God nop agɨlak, Bɨawl. Judas ne bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb olap yek ak pen wog anɨb ak kelɨgak agɨlak. Kelɨgɨl, man tɨmel ne ke ak amnak agɨlak. Amɨl, tep nop ak an dɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, bɨ omɨŋal awl aglɨpun agɨlak. Anɨb ak nad binɨb mɨdupsek gos nɨŋɨd gɨpal tek nepan ak nɨm, nep agnɨgobun agɨlak. Nad ke bɨ an aglɨpan ak age, nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgun agɨlak.
